feed.title: GitHub Nix Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Nix in GitHub

entry.title: anotherhadi/nixy
entry.summary: Nixy simplifies and unifies the Hyprland ecosystem with a modular, easily customizable setup. It provides a structured way to manage your system configuration and dotfiles with minimal effort.

entry.title: richen604/hydenix
entry.summary: a nixos implementation of hyprdots, a HyDE dotfiles configuration
